this is bles01147, works fine on 3.55kmew with multiman 2.00.004, just let multiman patch the .sfo and allow mutiman to download 1.01 update pkg, then install via the .pkg installer from the xmb and start the game from the xmb (I was also puzzled at the small size of the game (around 4.6Gb) but it seems to be the full game).

http://b0.ww.np.dl.playstation.net/tppkg/np/BLES01147/BLES01147_T1/93db9dcb0d88f279/EP1001-BLES01147_00-DUKENUKEMFOREVER-A0101-V0100-PE.pkg
is the link for the patch off Sony's servers.

Install that and it'll be good to go.
